languages.text: "Отряд сопровождения докладывает, что довериться ксеносам было ошибкой — оскверненный сектор атакует их с той же страстью, что и людей, к чему они были не готовы. Потери высоки".

"The escort squad reports that trusting the xenos turned out to be a mistake — the desecrated sector attacks them just as passionately as it does humans. They were not prepared, and causalities are high."
languages.original_text: "Отряд сопровождения докладывает, что довериться ксеносам было ошибкой — оскверненный сектор атакует их с той же страстью, что и людей, к чему они были не готовы. Потери высоки".

traits.locale_text: "The escort troop reports that trusting the xenos turned out to be a mistake — the desecrated sector attacks them just as passionately as it does humans, and they have not been prepared for it. The causalities are high."

"The escort troop reports that trusting the xenos turned out to be a mistake — the desecrated sector attacks them just as passionately as it does humans, and they have not been prepared for it. The causalities are high."

"The escort squad reports that trusting the xenos turned out to be a mistake — the desecrated sector attacks them just as passionately as it does humans. They were not prepared, and causalities are high."

"The escort squad reports that trusting the xenos turned out to be a mistake — the desecrated sector attacks them just as passionately as it does humans. They were not prepared, and causalities are high."

"The escort squad reports that trusting the xenos turned out to be a mistake — the desecrated sector attacks them just as passionately as it does humans. They were not prepared, and causalities are high."

languages.text: “小队报告说，相信异形是个错误。亵渎区域以同样凶暴的方式袭击了他们，而他们猝不及防，伤亡惨重。”
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that trusting the xenos turned out to be a mistake — the desecrated sector attacks them just as passionately as it does humans. They were not prepared, and causalities are high."

traits.locale_text: “小队报告说，相信异形是个错误。亵渎区域以同样凶暴的方式袭击了他们，而他们猝不及防，伤亡惨重。”

languages.text: «El escuadrón escolta informa de que confiar en los xenos resultó ser un error: el sector profanado les ataca con la misma ferocidad que a los humanos. No estaban preparados, y las bajas son altas».
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that trusting the xenos turned out to be a mistake — the desecrated sector attacks them just as passionately as it does humans. They were not prepared, and causalities are high."

traits.locale_text: «El escuadrón escolta informa de que confiar en los xenos resultó ser un error: el sector profanado les ataca con la misma ferocidad que a los humanos. No estaban preparados, y las bajas son altas».

languages.text: 「護衛部隊の報告によると、ゼノを信用したのは間違いだったようです...冒涜されたセクターが、人間と同じように猛烈な攻撃を仕掛けてきています。彼らは準備不足で、多くの犠牲者を出しているそうです」
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that trusting the xenos turned out to be a mistake — the desecrated sector attacks them just as passionately as it does humans. They were not prepared, and causalities are high."

traits.locale_text: 「護衛部隊の報告によると、ゼノを信用したのは間違いだったようです...冒涜されたセクターが、人間と同じように猛烈な攻撃を仕掛けてきています。彼らは準備不足で、多くの犠牲者を出しているそうです」

languages.text: « L'escorte rapporte que s'en remettre totalement aux xénos était une erreur, car les anomalies du secteur corrompu s'attaquent à eux aussi sûrement qu'aux humains. Ils ne s'étaient pas préparés à une telle violence et ont subi de lourdes pertes. »
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that trusting the xenos turned out to be a mistake — the desecrated sector attacks them just as passionately as it does humans. They were not prepared, and causalities are high."

traits.locale_text: « L'escorte rapporte que s'en remettre totalement aux xénos était une erreur, car les anomalies du secteur corrompu s'attaquent à eux aussi sûrement qu'aux humains. Ils ne s'étaient pas préparés à une telle violence et ont subi de lourdes pertes. »

languages.text: "Die Eskorte berichtet, dass es ein Fehler war, den Xenos zu vertrauen — der entweihte Sektor greift sie ebenso leidenschaftlich an wie die Menschen. Sie waren nicht vorbereitet, die Verluste sind hoch."
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that trusting the xenos turned out to be a mistake — the desecrated sector attacks them just as passionately as it does humans. They were not prepared, and causalities are high."

traits.locale_text: "Die Eskorte berichtet, dass es ein Fehler war, den Xenos zu vertrauen — der entweihte Sektor greift sie ebenso leidenschaftlich an wie die Menschen. Sie waren nicht vorbereitet, die Verluste sind hoch."
